akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization of appropriations for public recreation facilities

akn:content.akn:p: § 600e. Authorization of appropriations for public recreation facilities There are authorized to be appropriated such amounts, but not more than $1,100,000, as may be necessary for the investigation, preparation of plans, construction and acquisition of lands authorized in section 600d of this title. (Pub. L. 88–536, § 2, Aug. 31, 1964, 78 Stat. 744.)
